column1: titanic machine bones rising from desert sand
ribcage architecture spanning a chrome valley
vascular cables running through molten hills
steel dunes breathing with piston rhythm
bio-circuit coral reefs glowing underwater
rusted exoskeleton cities half consumed by moss
engineered cliffs with pulsing arterial lights
towering vertebrae bridge over synthetic ocean
servo forests swaying in electromagnetic wind
cybernetic vines wrapping fossil engines
neural lattice mountain emitting radio hum
organic turbines embedded in basalt plains
mechanical organs exposed beneath cracked terrain
fluid conduits shimmering under translucent skin of earth
mecha ruins colonized by crystalline growth
hive domes respirating clouds of nanodust
hybrid canyon carved by bio-mach motion
living reactor core replacing sun at zenith
mechanical glaciers grinding in metallic silence
machined heart valley glowing from internal fire
